metadata.title: CVE-2024-12393 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Drupal Core allows Cross-SiteScripting (XSS).This issue affects Drupal Core: from 8.8.0 before 10.2.11,from 10.3.0 before 10.3.9, from 11.0.0 before 11.0.8.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
